LogGatewayRegistered(string,string,addre.details: The symbol is included twice because strings have to be hashed first in order to be used as a log index/topic.

params._tokenSymbol: The symbol of the RenERC20 contract.

params._tokenAddress: The address of the RenERC20 contract.

getGateways(address,uint256).details: To get all the registered gateways use count = 0.

getRenTokens(address,uint256).details: To get all the registered RenERC20s use count = 0.

params._tokenSymbol: The symbol of the RenERC20 contract to        lookup.

getGatewayBySymbol(string).notice: Returns the Gateway contract for the given RenERC20         symbol.

getGatewayByToken(address).notice: Returns the Gateway contract for the given RenERC20         address.

getTokenBySymbol(string).notice: Returns the RenERC20 address for the given token symbol.

userdoc.notice: GatewayRegistry is a mapping from assets to their associated RenERC20 and Gateway contracts.

@notice GatewayRegistry is a mapping from assets to their associated
 RenERC20 and Gateway contracts.

@dev The symbol is included twice because strings have to be hashed
 first in order to be used as a log index/topic.
